org.maple.core

Class MapleSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.maple.core.MapleSystem

  • public class MapleSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Maple System is the runtime system which should be initiated on the SDN controller side

    • Constructor Summary

      MapleSystem(Controller c)
      Constructor to initiated the Maple System User should assign this.userFunction to their algorithm policy
